dimensions:
A. Height: 48cm (19in.) Width: 158.5cm (62 1/4in.)
 (seamed, 4 pieces)
B. Height: 48cm (19in.). Width: 103cm (40 1/2in.)
 (seamed, 4 pieces)
title: Valances
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Two shaped  valances made of the same fabric. The width differs on each of them but the height is the same. The pattern is a polychrome design of fruits and flowers on a white background. The valances are interlined, lined with linen plain weave and bound with woven green silk tape. The original glaze is on the fabric.
name: Valances
